SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT t.`ID` AS tID,t.`Name`,t.`TypeDescribe` FROM TB_MB_ArticleType AS t WHERE t.`Status`=TRUE ORDER BY t.`TypeSort`;

SELECT a.`ID` AS aID,a.`ArticleTitle`,a.`ArticleContent`,a.`ImageUrl`,a.`BitImageUrl`,a.`ArticleSource` ,a.`ArticleSourceUrl`,a.`PublishDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`PublishDate`) AS PublishDateTicks,a.`PraiseCount`,a.`CommentCount`,a.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks FROM TB_MB_Article AS a WHERE a.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND a.`ArticleType_ID`=@@ArticleType_ID@@ %> ORDER BY a.`ArticleSort`;

SELECT a.`ID` AS aID,a.`ArticleTitle`,a.`ArticleContent`,a.`ImageUrl`,a.`BitImageUrl`,a.`ArticleSource` ,a.`ArticleSourceUrl`,a.`PublishDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`PublishDate`) AS PublishDateTicks,a.`PraiseCount`,a.`CommentCount`,a.`CreationDate`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.`CreationDate`) AS CreationDateTicks FROM TB_MB_Article AS a WHERE a.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND a.`ID`=@@Article_ID@@ %> LIMIT 0,1;
